## gridLayout variable

Syntax sugar for [GridLayout](./imgui.gridlayout.md) ctor. By default creates a single-column layout at given position and width.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gridLayout: (x: number, y: number, width: number, cols?: number, rowH?: number, gap?: number) => GridLayout
```
